com.fergusleah.dla

Class Square

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.fergusleah.dla.Square

  • public class Square
extends java.lang.Object
    Square is used to represent a single particle or position in the scene

      • getMask

        public java.util.ArrayList<Square> getMask(int maskSize)
        For this square position, create and return a list of the closest neighbourhood square positions.
        Parameters:
        maskSize - The number of neighbourhood square positions in the mask.
        Returns:
        The list of neighbourhood square positions which the mask consists of.
